sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Michael Thomas Beer Sells 50,000 Shares of Energy Vault (NYSE:NRGV) Stock
feed.summary: Energy Vault CFO Michael Thomas Beer sold 50,000 shares of NYSE:NRGV stock for $245,500 on December 23rd, decreasing his position by 4.16%. The company missed quarterly EPS and revenue estimates, and analysts are split on its future, with a consensus "Hold" rating and a target price of $2.67. Energy Vault specializes in gravity-based energy storage solutions.

feed.title: Energy Vault (NRGV) Is Up 11.1% After $145M Shelf Filing And Swiss FlexGrid Launch - Has The Bull Case Changed?
feed.summary: Energy Vault (NRGV) recently saw an 11.1% stock increase following a $145 million shelf registration and its entry into the Swiss market with FlexGrid, a new battery storage solution. This expansion adds to Energy Vault's B-VAULT portfolio, now exceeding 2 GWh, and aligns with its strategy of owning and operating battery and storage assets. The new developments, particularly the Swiss FlexGrid launch, are expected to reshape the company's investment narrative by scaling its platform through long-term agreements, although potential dilution from the shelf registration remains a risk.

feed.title: Energy Vault (NRGV) Is Up 11.1% After $145M Shelf Filing And Swiss FlexGrid Launch - Has The Bull Case Changed?
feed.summary: Energy Vault (NRGV) saw an 11.1% increase in stock value following a $145 million shelf registration for common shares and the launch of its FlexGrid battery storage configuration in Switzerland. The Swiss launch, involving agreements with Schindler Group and Energie Wettingen AG, expands Energy Vault's European presence and integrates into its Asset Vault strategy for owning and operating battery storage, aiming for recurring EBITDA. While these developments are encouraging, investors should consider the potential for dilution from the shelf registration and the company's reliance on successful execution of capital-intensive projects.

feed.title: Energy Vault (NRGV) Valuation Check After Swiss FlexGrid Expansion and New Partner Agreements
feed.summary: Energy Vault (NRGV) has gained attention after expanding into the Swiss market with its FlexGrid battery storage and securing agreements, leading to a significant 120% 3-month share price return. Despite this momentum, a "Most Popular Narrative" suggests the stock is overvalued with a fair value of $3.73 against a last close of $4.97, while analysts have a consensus price target of $1.1. The article advises investors to consider if the market has already factored in future growth, highlighting the discrepancy between current share price and valuation metrics.

feed.title: Energy Vault (NRGV) Valuation Check After Swiss FlexGrid Expansion and New Partner Agreements
feed.summary: Energy Vault (NRGV) has gained market attention after expanding into Switzerland with its FlexGrid battery storage and securing new partner agreements, leading to a significant increase in its stock price. Despite this momentum, the company's valuation is deemed "Overvalued" by analysts, with a fair value of $3.73 against a current share price of $4.97, suggesting market optimism might be ahead of its current financial performance. The article explores the underlying financial narratives and risks associated with Energy Vault's future growth.

feed.title: Energy Vault (NYSE:NRGV) Shares Down 9.9% - Here's What Happened
feed.summary: Shares of Energy Vault (NYSE:NRGV) dropped 9.9% on Friday, closing at $4.8850 with trading volume significantly below average. The company faces mixed analyst sentiment, with a "Hold" consensus rating and a target price of $2.67, which is below its recent share price. This decline follows Energy Vault missing quarterly earnings and revenue estimates and reporting negative net margins and return on equity, suggesting fundamental weaknesses.

feed.title: Investors Purchase High Volume of Energy Vault Call Options (NYSE:NRGV)
feed.summary: Investors acquired a high volume of call options for Energy Vault (NYSE:NRGV), representing a 287% increase in daily call volume. This unusual options activity follows a mixed analyst outlook, recent insider transactions with both sales and purchases, and an earnings miss. Despite the earnings shortfall, the stock is trading within its 52-week high range.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) Formally Enters the Swiss Market
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:NRGV) has officially entered the Swiss market with its new FlexGrid B-VAULT battery energy storage system, designed for commercial and industrial clients. The company secured agreements with Schindler Group and Energie Wettingen AG, expanding its global B-VAULT portfolio to over 2 GWh. Energy Vault's share price surged by 23.84% recently, with an 85% increase since the beginning of 2025.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) Formally Enters the Swiss Market
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) has officially entered the Swiss market by launching FlexGrid, a new configuration of its B-VAULT battery energy storage system tailored for commercial and industrial clients. The company secured agreements with Schindler Group and Energie Wettingen AG, expanding its global footprint. This strategic move follows a significant surge in NRGV's share price and aims to address Europe's evolving energy demands with compact, modular, and regulation-ready solutions.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) Formally Enters the Swiss Market
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) has formally entered the Swiss market with its new B-VAULT FlexGrid battery energy storage system designed for commercial and industrial clients. The company secured agreements with Schindler Group and Energie Wettingen AG, expanding its global footprint with over 2 GWh of deployed or contracted systems. This move follows a period of significant stock price growth for NRGV, which has risen over 85% since the beginning of 2025.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:NRGV) Receives Consensus Rating of "Hold" from Analysts
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:NRGV) has received a consensus "Hold" rating from analysts, with half issuing a "Buy" and half a "Sell" recommendation, leading to an average 12-month price target of $2.6725. The company recently missed earnings and revenue estimates and exhibits negative financial metrics. Insider trading activity shows mixed signals, with the CEO buying shares but overall net sales by insiders in the last 90 days.

feed.title: Energy Vault stock rises as company launches FlexGrid in Switzerland
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings Inc. (NYSE:NRGV) saw its stock jump 7% after announcing its entry into the Swiss market with two contracts for its B-VAULT FlexGrid energy storage system. The company launched its FlexGrid program, designed for commercial and industrial customers, and established a regional service and logistics center in Central Switzerland. These projects contribute to its global B-VAULT portfolio, which now exceeds 2 GWh of deployed or contracted systems.

feed.title: Energy Vault enters Swiss market with battery storage projects for industrial use
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. has officially expanded into the Swiss market by securing two contracts for its B-VAULT battery energy storage systems, deploying a 2 MW/2-hour system at Schindler Group's headquarters and signing an agreement for an 8 MW/2-hour system with Energie Wettingen AG. These projects mark the launch of Energy Vault’s FlexGrid program, designed for commercial, industrial, and small-utility applications, and will contribute to Switzerland's largest flexibility network, CKW's Flexpool, for grid stability. Despite recent financial results showing a revenue miss and lower-than-forecast EPS for Q3 2025, the company's shares surged over 105% in the past year, and analysts anticipate sales growth.

feed.title: Energy Vault Secures Swiss Market Entry with Signed B-VAULT™ Deployment Contracts for Schindler and Energie Wettingen Projects, Launch of FlexGrid Product for Urban and Utility Applications
feed.summary: Energy Vault has officially entered the Swiss market with its new FlexGrid product, designed for commercial and industrial customers, and secured two B-VAULT™ deployment contracts with Schindler and Energie Wettingen. These projects demonstrate the company's ability to integrate energy storage solutions in both industrial and municipal settings, contributing to grid stability and renewable energy expansion. The B-VAULT FlexGrid systems will participate in CKW’s Flexpool, Switzerland's largest flexibility network, for frequency regulation and voltage stabilization.

feed.title: Energy Vault, EU Green Energy Sign Framework Agreement for Deployment of up to $250 Million of Battery Energy Storage Systems, Totaling 1.8 GWh, to Accelerate Renewable Deployment
feed.summary: Energy Vault and EU Green Energy have signed a Framework Supply Agreement for the deployment of up to 1.8 GWh of Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS) over the next four years in the Balkan region, valued at up to $250 million. This partnership aims to accelerate renewable energy integration and enhance grid flexibility in countries like Albania, Kosovo, North Macedonia, and Montenegro. The first phase of a 100 MW / 400 MWh BESS installation in Albania has already commenced development, utilizing Energy Vault's B-VAULT™ and VaultOS™ platforms.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings (NRGV) Price Target Increased by 35.64% to 3.80
feed.summary: Fintel has increased the average one-year price target for Energy Vault Holdings (NYSE:NRGV) by 35.64% to $3.80 per share, up from $2.80. This new target represents a 22.73% increase from its last closing price of $3.10. Institutional holdings show a bullish sentiment with a put/call ratio of 0.12, although total shares owned by institutions slightly decreased by 1.44% in the last quarter.

feed.title: Energy Vault to Host Investor & Analyst Day on October 29, 2025
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: NRGV) announced it will host a virtual Investor & Analyst Day on October 29, 2025, to provide in-depth insights into its Asset Vault platform and strategic growth initiatives. The company recently celebrated the launch of Asset Vault and acquired the 150 MW SOSA Energy Center in Texas, showcasing its "Own & Operate" energy asset management strategy. Energy Vault aims for Asset Vault to generate over $100 million in recurring annual EBITDA within the next 3-4 years.

feed.title: Energy Vault Announces Acquisition of 150 MW Battery Energy Storage Project in Texas Under New Asset Vault Platform
feed.summary: Energy Vault has acquired the SOSA Energy Center, a 150 MW/300 MWh battery energy storage system in Texas, marking the first project under its new Asset Vault platform. This project, expected to generate significant annual revenues, will provide critical grid support in the ERCOT North market. The acquisition is supported by a $300 million preferred equity investment from Orion Infrastructure Capital and leverages Energy Vault's third-generation B-VAULT™ AC product.

feed.title: Roth Capital Weighs in on Energy Vault FY2027 Earnings
feed.summary: Roth Capital analysts have initiated coverage on Energy Vault Holdings (NYSE:NRGV) with a "neutral" rating and a $1.25 price target for FY2027. Other analysts have also adjusted their ratings and price targets for the company, while recent insider activity shows a CFO stock sale. Institutional investors have significantly altered their stakes in Energy Vault, with 40.03% of the stock currently owned by hedge funds and other institutional investors.

feed.title: Q3 EPS Estimates for Energy Vault Decreased by Roth Capital - MarketBeat
feed.summary: Roth Capital has reduced its Q3 2025 earnings per share estimates for Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:NRGV) to ($0.03) from ($0.02). The firm also provided updated EPS forecasts for FY2025, Q1 2026, Q2 2026, Q4 2026, and FY2026. The article also details recent trading performance of NRGV, its last earnings report, institutional and insider trading activity, and information about the company.

feed.title: Energy Vault Secures $300M Investment for ‘Asset Vault’ - TipRanks
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings Inc. announced securing a $300 million preferred equity investment from Orion Infrastructure Capital (OIC) to launch its 'Asset Vault' platform. This strategic joint venture aims to develop, build, and operate over 1.5GW of energy storage projects globally, positioning Energy Vault as an Independent Power Producer. The platform is projected to generate over $100 million in recurring annual EBITDA within 3-4 years by leveraging Energy Vault's operational expertise and vertically integrated ecosystem.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings Secures Additional $50 Million to Support Energy Storage Growth Projects
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings Inc. has secured an additional $50 million in corporate debenture financing from YA II PN, Ltd. This funding enhances the company's financial flexibility for growth projects and is separate from a previously announced $300 million equity investment for "Asset Vault." The capital will support Energy Vault's strategy to own and operate energy storage assets, addressing the growing demand for energy storage, including for AI data center buildouts.

feed.title: Energy Vault and RackScale Data Centers Announce Strategic Partnership to Accelerate Delivery of 2GW of Power to Data Centers
feed.summary: Energy Vault and RackScale Data Centers (RSDC) have formed a strategic partnership to deliver 2GW of firm, primary power to data center sites. This collaboration will utilize Energy Vault's proprietary B-Nest™ hyperscale battery energy storage system, which offers 8X the energy density of standard solutions, enabling rapid data center deployment by overcoming grid power shortages. The B-Nest™ will provide full primary power for over 10 hours per data center, ensuring 24/7 availability even with interruptible utility contracts, and is designed to meet the surging power demands of the AI-driven data center sector.

feed.title: Energy Vault and Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM) Announce Exclusive Global Gravity Energy Storage Partnership to Integrate Energy Storage into Building Design
feed.summary: Energy Vault and Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM) have formed an exclusive global partnership to integrate gravity energy storage solutions into building design. This collaboration aims to accelerate carbon payback in building construction and operation, leveraging Energy Vault's G-VAULT technology and SOM's architectural expertise. The partnership introduces new G-VAULT™ solutions like EVu, EVc, EVy, and EV0, designed for various applications from skyscrapers to natural environments, to foster sustainable building architectures and energy efficiency.

feed.title: Energy Vault and Enervest Announce Agreement for 1.0 GWh Energy Storage Project for the Stoney Creek Battery Energy Storage System in New South Wales, Australia
feed.summary: Energy Vault and Enervest Group have signed an agreement for the deployment of a 1,000 MWh battery energy storage system (BESS) at the Stoney Creek site in New South Wales, Australia. This $350 million+ project aims to provide flexible, grid-scale energy storage, enhancing renewable energy generation and the stability of the New South Wales power grid. Energy Vault will serve as the turn-key engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning partner and system integrator for the project, utilizing its proprietary X-Vault integration platform.

feed.title: Energy Vault Signs Deal In Australia
feed.summary: Westlake Village-based Energy Vault Holdings Inc. has secured a deal worth approximately $350 million to deploy a 1,000 megawatt-hour battery energy storage system in New South Wales, Australia. This project, developed by Enervest Group, marks Energy Vault's third battery energy storage endeavor in Australia, following two prior agreements with ACEN Corp.'s Australian subsidiary. The system will be located in Narrabri and requires approval from Australian grid officials.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. Announces Inducement Grants Under NYSE Listing Rule 303A.08
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. announced inducement grants of restricted stock units and stock options to new non-executive employees and their Group Executive, Greg Daily, effective September 24, 2024. These grants were made under the Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. 2022 Employment Inducement Award Plan as material inducements for employment, in compliance with NYSE Listing Rule 303A.08. The awards include 100,000 restricted stock units for new employees, an option to purchase 250,000 shares for Greg Daily, and an additional 500,000 restricted stock units and 500,000 performance-based restricted stock units for Daily.

feed.title: Energy Vault, Wellhead Electric and W Power Announce Agreement for 275 MWh Energy Storage Project in Southern California
feed.summary: Energy Vault, Wellhead Electric, and W Power have announced an agreement to deploy a 275 MWh battery energy storage system in Stanton, California, one of the largest in Southern California. The project will leverage Energy Vault Solutions' proprietary system design and Energy Management Software, with deployment beginning immediately in 2022 and completion expected in mid-2023. Wellhead Electric has also selected Energy Vault as a preferred integrator for two additional hybrid energy storage projects in Southern California, totaling approximately 600 MWh+ of additional capacity.

feed.title: Energy Vault, Atlas Renewable and China Tianying Begin Construction of First Chinese Deployment of EVx™ Gravity-Based Energy Storage System
feed.summary: Energy Vault, Atlas Renewable, and China Tianying have begun construction of the first EVx™ gravity-based energy storage system in China, a 100 MWh project adjacent to a wind farm in Rudong, Jiangsu Province. This deployment aims to support grid resiliency and deliver renewable energy to the State Grid Corporation of China, aligning with China's "30-60" carbon neutrality policy. This initiative represents a significant U.S.-China collaboration in climate action, with a $50 million licensing agreement for Energy Vault's technology in the Chinese power market.

feed.title: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. Begins Trading on the New York Stock Exchange
feed.summary: Energy Vault Holdings, Inc. began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on February 14, 2022, under ticker symbols NRGV and NRGV WS, following its business combination with Novus Capital Corporation II. The transaction raised approximately $235 million in gross proceeds, along with an additional $107 million from its Series C and a $50 million license fee from Atlas Renewable, to fund its growth strategy in sustainable, grid-scale energy storage solutions. Energy Vault aims to accelerate decarbonization through proprietary energy storage technologies, AI-driven energy management software, and flexible integration platforms designed to reduce the levelized cost of energy while maintaining reliability using eco-friendly materials.
